400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be processed. Please check the data sent.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to sign in to access this resource.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The request took too long to process. Please try again.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: An internal error occurred. Our team has been notified.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response. Please try again in a few minutes.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again soon.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server took too long to respond. Please try again.

validation.passwordStrength: Password must have at least 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase and one number
validation.futureDate: Date must be in the future
validation.pastDate: Date must be in the past

auth.accountLocked: Account temporarily locked. Please try again later
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before continuing
auth.tokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
auth.emailInUse: This email is already being used
auth.socialAuthFailed: Social authentication failed. Please try again

survey.limitReached: This survey has reached its response limit
survey.alreadyResponded: You have already responded to this survey
survey.invalidAccess: You don't have access to this survey
survey.publishFailed: Failed to publish survey. Make sure there are questions added

upload.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size: {size}

payment.cardDeclined: Card declined. Please check the details or try another card

network.offline: You are offline. Please check your internet connection
network.timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again
network.connectionError: Connection error. Please check your internet

generic.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
generic.tryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again
generic.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support
